name: cifti-merge-dense
author: Washington University School of Medicin
description:
MERGE CIFTI FILES ALONG DENSE DIMENSION.

The input cifti files must have matching mappings along the direction not specified, and the mapping along the specified direction must be brain models.

inputs.name: direction
inputs.description: which dimension to merge along, ROW or COLUMN

inputs.name: opt_label_collision_action
inputs.description: how to handle conflicts between label keys: 'ERROR', 'FIRST', or 'LEGACY', default 'ERROR', use 'LEGACY' to match v1.4.2 and earlier

inputs.name: opt_cifti_cifti_in
inputs.description: specify an input cifti file: a cifti file to merge
